name: CrunchControl
description:
Crunch Control is a short strategic card battler where you are sent into the offices of the dystopian mega-corporation Ezekiel International and charged with completing a number of tasks. You must battle the employees of the office, preventing their escape by laying down a number of traps and unleashing brutal attacks upon them.

This game was created for a university project by a group of students.

Credits:

Tally Summers (formally Benjamin Summers) – Producer/Designer

Zihang Jiao – Programmer

Rachel Brown – Artist

Alena Barr – Artist

Luke West – Designer

Daniel Wilson – Designer
